summary:
Two scripts: One sorts items out the other brings the items back.
Non-playable testing cell to showcase the scripts in action.
descriptionHtml:
There have been a couple individuals that expressed a desire to be able to sort items across multiple containers. Specifically they wanted to have one item per container. I offered to make the script. This then is the result. I am posting here so that others may benefit and use these scripts if they'd like.

Tutorial instructions on how to setup & modify the script for other item types is included in the modders resource download.

Instructions on how to access the testing cell and the features found within are included in the non-playable testing cell download. See the pictures for an idea of what is included in the testing cell.

I have no intentions of taking the testing cell further into a playable home, therefore feel free to do so if you wish.

Feel free to comment in the comment section if you need assistance with modifying the scripts for your uses. I'll try to help if I can.

All I ask is credit and a link to your mod so that I may add it here.

NOTE:
Forgot to mention in the included documentation that if you do modify the script it would be a good idea to rename it. Just in case other mods use the script too. Don't want one mod not working cause another changed the script behavior.

DISCLAIMER:
This may seem similar to Sjogga's scripts & tutorial listed here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24678]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24678[/url]. However, I did not use his tutorial and he should be aware that I had already worked on a similar technique based on the two posts in [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/754151-tutorials-without-youtoob/page__view__findpost__p__6348175]this thread[/url]. This is merely a modification of my own work from having learned how to transfer items by working with Manilla Turtle's scripts from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12468]Automatic Storage[/url] for my mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22944]Automatic Storage for Vidani's Bag of Holding[/url]
author: IsharaMeradin
